articles.description: The NRL will ramp up discussions with state governments after Prime Minister Scott Morrison flagged the prospect of 10,000-strong crowds returning to stadiums next month.

articles.title: Mates v mates? Eagles set to 'borrow' Suns for scratch match - AFL

articles.content:
